title: How to convert an image to text using OCR - Quora

response.answer_text: You can convert an image to text using the following solutions: # Online Tool Online2pdf is a web-based service to convert native/scanned PDFs and images to Text, Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Images, searchable PDF, etc. But it only allows a maximum of 20 pages to be converted. Browser images files into the tool. and upload them to the service.Choose output as Text.Turn on the OCR in images and select the OCR language.Click “Convert”. # Third-party Tool Cisdem PDF OCR Converter for Mac is an easy-to-use OCR program that can convert PDF(scanned and native) and images to 16 formats like Text, Word, Excel, Pages, Image, Html, and so on. It can convert up to 200 image files at the same time. Upload images to the “Converter” interface by dragging and dropping.Select the page range, language, and select output format as Text. Note: For images, the OCR button is on by default. For scanned PDFs, you need to turn on the button manually.Click “Convert”.
